sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: OkapiLib is a PROS library for programming VEX V5 robots. This library is intended to raise the floor for teams with all levels of experience. New teams should have an easier time getting their robot up and running, and veteran teams should find that OkapiLib doesn't get in the way or place any limits on functionality.
For tutorials on how to get the most out of OkapiLib, see the Tutorials section:
For documentation on using the OkapiLib API, see the OkapiLib API section:
Not sure where to go? Take a look at the Getting Started tutorial <tutorials/walkthrough/getting-started.html>_.
